email_subject: Olympus Brio D-100 1.3 MegaPixel Digital Camera: Starting Bid $99
email_body: Check out the latest deals in our Auctions Weekly Newsletter, featuring the Olympus Brio D-100 1.3 MegaPixel Digital Camera with a starting bid of just $99! This camera comes with a 1.3 MegaPixel Resolution, 8MB Smartmedia Card, Seamless 2X Digital Zoom, 1280 x 960 Pixel Resolution, Auto Connect USB Function, and Olympus TruePic Technology. Don't miss out on this and other great deals including printers, scanners, monitors, and more. Place your bid now and take advantage of these amazing offers!
